meta.title: Breadcrumb
meta.description: Indicate the current page's location within a navigational hierarchy. Separators are automatically added in CSS through ::before and content.

props.description: Array of breadcrumb items to render

slots.name: default
slots.description: Content (breadcrumb items) to place in the breadcrumb

props.description: Sets the value of the 'aria-current' attribute (when the item is the active item). Supported string values are 'location', 'page', or 'true'
